**Manuscripts that form the basis of this thesis**  


Caniglia E.C., **Rojas-Saunero L.P.**, Hilal S., Licher S., Logan R., Stricker B., Ikram M.A., Swanson S.A. [Emulating a target trial of statin use and risk of dementia using cohort data](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32753444/). _Neurology._ 2020;95(10):e1322-e1332. (Chapter 2)  

**Rojas-Saunero L.P.**, Hilal S., Murray E.J., Logan R.W., Ikram M.A., Swanson S.A. [Hypothetical blood-pressure-lowering interventions and risk of stroke and dementia](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33247419/). _European Journal of Epidemiology._ 2021;36(1):69-79. (Chapter 3)  

**Rojas-Saunero L.P.**, van der Willik K.D., Schagen S.B., Ikram M.A., Swanson S.A. Towards a clearer causal question underlying the association between cancer and dementia. _Submitted_ (Chapter 4)     

**Rojas-Saunero L.P.**, Young J.G., Didelez V., Ikram M.A., Swanson S.A. How are we counting the dead in dementia studies? _Submitted_ (Chapter 5)

**Rojas-Saunero L.P.**, Young J.G., Didelez V., Ikram M.A., Swanson S.A. Choosing questions before methods in dementia research with competing events and causal goals _Submitted_ (Chapter 6)
